official_title: A bill to amend the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for implementation of the development plan for Pennsylvania Avenue between the Capitol and the White House, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to increase the authorization of appropriations for FY 1992 and to authorize appropriations for FY 1993 and 1994 for operating and administrative expenses of the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Pennsylvania Avenue Development Corporation Act of 1972 to authorize appropriations for implementation of the development plan for Pennsylvania Avenue between the Capitol and the White House, and for other purposes.
